title: All Stars Voting
body: Is the All Stars voting supposed to be working? Can we actually submit our votes in? Because when I go to do so it asks me to log in even though I'm already logged in. Once I click it, it just takes me back to the voting page and when I go to submit it just does it again. It's really annoying and they said that the voting ends on the 8th? I want to submit my vote now but it's not letting me.

replies.body: i know its annoying, Do it through your league client and it will redirect you ...  they really need to fx this fast
